tiers.description: Mission-critical service or repository. Failure could result in significant impact to revenue or reputation.
tiers.name: Tier 1

tiers.description: Customer-facing service or repository. Failure results in degraded experience for customers, although without significant impact to revenue or reputation.
tiers.name: Tier 2

tiers.description: Internal service or repository. Failure could result in productivity being compromised within the company.
tiers.name: Tier 3

tiers.description: Other service or repository. Failure doesn't result in immediate or significant impact.
tiers.name: Tier 4
